address: 500 North Central Avenue, Suite 930, Glendale, CA 91203
valueProp: Ascendant LLP is a multistate law firm dedicated to providing and maintaining comprehensive tax reduction, wealth protection and estate planning strategies for its domestic and international clientele. With combined professional experiences in legal and financial industries, we ensure that our clients’ wealth planning needs are addressed in all respects.
CTA: Welcome to Our Newest Attorney, Yuri Choe
